description:
CENTRAL & MODERN
• Quality Built 2B/R Brick Townhouse with lock-up garage
• Currently rented for $245.00 per week
• Low maintenance with split system air conditioner
• Open Living Plan with a well tiled Living & Dining areas

AUCTION - Saturday 23rd July @ 11am On-Site
Prime Land & Prime Location
Approximately 92 Acres(37 Hectares) only 3 kilometres from Cobram, fronting the Koonoomoo Road. Excellent soil type suitable for Lucerne, fruit growing, horticulture etc.. Sold with 10megs. of high reliability with possible future allocation of 312 megs high and 144 megs low. An appealing block with established trees and would make a fantastic new home site S.T.C.A.
Rarely available are quality blocks of this size so close to town.
Property Code: 403901564

Quality Executive Family Home
This executive family home comprises everything a growing family needs. Four bedrooms, two living areas, in-ground pool and shed all located within a cul-da-sac with a park right next door for the kids to enjoy! The formal lounge and master bedroom are located towards the front of the home which both overlook a decked courtyard area. The master also enjoys walk through robes and Ensuite with separate toilet, shower and oversized vanity. The informal living areas overlook the sensational 916sqm block and in-ground solar heated lap pool. The timber kitchen is centrally located and features electric wall oven, gas hot plates and dishwasher and offers an abundance of storage and bench space. It overlooks the large meals area which is set into a glazed window bay projection. The family room has cathedral ceilings with both ceilings and windows that seem to soar towards the sky giving the appearance of so much space! Two of the bedrooms offer built in robes with the fourth bedroom being able to be utilised as a bedroom or study depending on your family needs. This home has all the mod cons with instantaneous gas hot water service with individual temperature controls, gas ducted heating, evaporative air conditioning, 5 k/W solar power to reduce your power bills, ducted vacuum system, inground sprinklers, spa bath and remote controllers to the double garage which has direct access into the home giving added security. The 6x7m (approx) colorbond shed has small mezzanine floor for storage, power and concrete floor. Imagine entertaining in the outdoor entertaining area with family and friends with all this family home has to offer! You won't be disappointed, call now for an appointment.

Superb Family Home ~ Great Location
This well built four bedroom family home is located in a lovely part of Cobram. It features a spacious open kitchen/dining/living area plus a separate formal lounge and dining, four good size bedrooms, main with walk in robe and ensuite and all others with built in robes, and main bathroom with spa bath. Double garage with roller door, paved outdoor entertaining area and a good size backyard providing plenty of space for the family. Ducted evaporative cooling, gas heating and 3.5kw solar panel system with 31c rebate, small garden shed and low maintenance surrounds. A quality home in a great location, don't miss out!
Property Code: 403901929

6 UNIT INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY
Six bedsitter units on one title available for purchase. Excellent investment opportunity. All units consist of one main room with kitchen facilities and a separate bathroom. Freshly painted externally. Great long term rental history with rental income of approximately $690 per week for the 6 units.
Call now for more details or to arrange an inspection.
Property Code: 403901101

Immaculate Home ~ First Time Offered
This impressive three bedroom home in immaculate condition is sited on a generous 800 square metre block in a great location. It features a well appointed kitchen with wall oven, and a lounge with feature slate wall and timber floating floor. Great size bedrooms, all with built in robes and ceiling fans, reverse cycle air conditioning and gas heating. Outside features a large covered outdoor entertaining/barbecue area, carport, garden sheds, and lovely established surrounds. This property represents an excellent opportunity for the first home buyer, retiree or investor. Don't miss out, inspect today!
Property Code: 403901881

address: Lot 188 Villa Court, Murray River Estate Cobram VIC 3644
description:

Great Investment ~ Tenant in Place!
Neat three bedroom fibro home perfect for the investor or first home buyer. Featuring carpeted lounge with cooling only air conditioner, cosy kitchen with electric cooking and separate dining area. The three bedrooms all have built in robes and ceiling fans. Bathroom includes a bath and separate shower recess. Separate toilet. Ducted gas heating. The yard is securely fenced and has a garden shed. Currently rented at $ 200 per week.
Excellent opportunity to purchase a well-cared for home with a tenant in place!

Ripe For Subdivision ~ Great First Home
Solid well presented three bedroom weatherboard residence, sited on a large 1270 square metre corner block in a very convenient location. The house is in good condition, has been re stumped with new kitchen and bathroom. Three good size bedrooms, reverse cycle split system air conditioning, ceiling fans and two toilets. A few cosmetic touches would transform this appealing home. A fantastic opportunity for the first home buyer or smart investor as this block is cherry ripe for subdivision (subject to council approval). INSPECT TODAY.

Quality Home ~ Prime Location
Open plan living is a great feature of this comfortable family home. Kitchen features gas cooking, dishwasher, walk in pantry and plenty of cupboard space. Spacious lounge/dining area with solid fuel heater, gas heating and split system air conditioner. Three generous bedrooms, all with built in robes and main with direct access to family bathroom. Outside features a double lock up garage, spacious colorbond shed with concrete floor, power and easy access to yard. A quality home in a great location that's priced to sell. Inspect today!

Top quality two bedroom townhouse in a fantastic location. Features open living area, spacious kitchen, good size bedrooms, separate toilet & laundry. Quality fittings, direct house access from lock-up garage. Appealing low maintenance surrounds. Perfect for retirees, no need to drive, short walk to CBD.

Display Home Presentation - 5 minutes drive to Cobram
Set on 7100M2 (1.7 Acres) this home is set in parklike gardens. The presentation is fabulous & maintenance is "spot on". The home offers 2 formal living areas with cathedral ceilings, 3 bedrooms with ensuite to main & BIRs in balance, well designed kitchen. S/C heating & ducted air conditioning. Enclosed outdoors/BBQ entertaining area. 18m x 8m mach shed/workshop with power. Excellent water supply setup inc 2.5ML S&D from channel & 3 x 5000 gal rain water tanks for domestic usage.
Well worth inspecting.
Property Code: 366

All Offers Considered
This spacious family home is ideally positioned in a quiet court and close to the Murray River. Features stunning kitchen area with stone benches, quality appliances and large walk in pantry. Tiled open living area, separate lounge & theatre room. Four spacious bedrooms including an extra large main bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe. Ducted R/C S/S air conditioner. 5 kw solar electricity system. Alfresco area and direct house access from large garage.
A top quality home in a fantastic location. INSPECTION WILL IMPRESS.
Property Code: 403901566

Looking for a productive lifestyle property? If you answered yes! This is one for you
Beautifully presented 4 Bedroom 2 Bathroom home with well appointed kitchen/meals area, separate lounge, main bedroom with ensuite, set in superb garden with established trees. 3KW high efficiency Solar System. Seperate 2 car lockup garage & carport, along with a magnificent 3 Bay Colour bond American Barn, fully enclosed with concrete flooring throughout. Frontage to a major road, would lend itself for anyone wishing to promote a small stud, business etc. Located just 7 Km from Cobram, this property comprises 42 acres of which 30 has been lasered, with top quality irrigation infrastructure with large outlets. Is fully recycled to a large 2mg dam equipped with motor & pump, with access to drainage. The property is cyclone fenced into 12 separate tree lined paddocks, with flexibility of sheep & cattle yards & crush, which makes this property easy to manage. S&D bore to house Garden & troughs, 4 rain water tanks: G.M.W Delivery entitlements. 10 acres of redgum bushland at the rear of the property, along with yabby dam, provides an ideal setting that can be enjoyed by the whole family. A property with the option of production andor lifestyle close to the Murray River.
